front.title: Use of GOST Signature Algorithms in DNSKEY and RRSIG Resource Records for DNSSEC

abstract.t: This document describes how to produce digital signatures and hash functions using the GOST R 34.10-2001 and GOST R 34.11-94 algorithms for DNSKEY, RRSIG, and DS resource records, for use in the Domain Name System Security Extensions (DNSSEC). [STANDARDS-TRACK]
